text: The Cloud of Unknowing is the fifth studio album from James Blackshaw and takes its title from a medieval book. It was released in the United States on June 5, 2007.[ The Cloud of Unknowing > Overview ]. Allmusic. Retrieved on December 5, 2008. == Track listing == # "The Cloud of Unknowing" – 10:55 # "Running to the Ghost" – 6:16 # "Clouds Collapse" – 3:56 # "The Mirror Speaks" – 6:31 # "Stained Glass Windows" – 15:03 == References == Category:2007 albums Category:James Blackshaw albums Category:Instrumental albums
title: The Cloud of Unknowing (album)
